message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with online learning problems, which are typically studied in the machine learning and artificial intelligence communities (cs.LG, cs.AI). The focus on achieving regret that is efficient in the sense of being the same order as the lowest regret amongst K experts suggests a theoretical emphasis, which could place the paper in the information theory (cs.IT) or systems and control (cs.SY) categories. Finally, the use of the online subgradient algorithm suggests a connection to optimization and convex analysis, which could place the paper in the data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) category.
